laptops.name: apple-laptop.png

laptops.name: Lenovo ThinkPad T14
laptops.description: The Lenovo ThinkPad T14 is a powerful business laptop with a 14-inch FHD display, built-in security features, and long battery life. Powered by an 11th generation Intel Core i7 processor and NVIDIA GeForce MX450 graphics.

monitors.name: Dell UltraSharp U2415
monitors.description: The Dell UltraSharp U2415 is a 24-inch LED monitor with a 1920x1200 resolution, wide viewing angles, and a wide color gamut for color-critical applications.

monitors.name: BenQ PD2700U
monitors.description: The BenQ PD2700U is a 27-inch 4K monitor with a 3840x2160 resolution, USB-C connectivity, and a wide color gamut for color-critical work. It features a sleek and modern design, and it's compatible with both MAC and PC

tablets.name: iPad Pro

tablets.name: Amazon Fire HD 10
tablets.description: The Amazon Fire HD 10 is a budget-friendly tablet with a 10.1-inch HD display, quad-core processor, and up to 2GB of RAM. Comes with Amazon's Alexa built-in.

tablets.name: ASUS ZenPad Z8s
